Preprocessing¶

General preprocessing functions¶

cadrres.pp.gexp.log2_exp(exp_df)[source]¶

Calculate log2 gene expression

cadrres.pp.gexp.normalize_L1000_suite()[source]¶
cadrres.pp.gexp.normalize_log2_mean_fc(log2_exp_df)[source]¶

Calculate gene expression foldchange based on median of each genes. The sample size should be large enough (>10).

Preprocessing functions for single-cell data¶

cadrres.pp.scgexp.calculate_cluster_prof(sc_log2_exp_df, sc_info_df)[source]¶

Calculate gene expression profile for each cell cluster

cadrres.pp.scgexp.calculate_het_score(cell_cluster_proportion_df)[source]¶

Calculate intra-sample heterogeneity score using entropy (with renormalization)

Parameters

cell_cluster_proportion_df – proportion of cell clusters (row:sample, col:cluster)

Returns

DataFrame of heterogeneity score

cadrres.pp.scgexp.get_sample_cluster_percent(sample_cell_df, cutoff=0.1)[source]¶

Calculate proportion of each cell cluster in each sample

Parameters

  • cell_cluster_df (DataFrame) – Two columns for cell_id and cluster_id

  • cutoff (float) – If a cluster presented in less than the cutoff, then set its percentage to 0

Returns

DataFrame (cell_cluster_proportion_df) of proportion of cell clusters (row:sample, col:cluster)
